DOC.brief_summary: This study compare Cognitive Behavioral Social Skills Training-Compensatory Cognitive Training ( CBSST-CCT ) goal-focused supportive contact group see intervention well improve symptom function people schizophrenia .
DOC.brief_title: Improving Negative Symptoms Psychosis In Real-world Environments
